name: the last afterhour - party under the cemetery
name_original: the last afterhour - party under the cemetery
description:
playing fullscreen is highly recommended.

something weird is going on under the cemetery, and you're about to go down there and find out!
can you reach the third level and figure out what's happening?

controls
(can be remapped in the settings)
movement: wasd
interact: e
flashlight: l
sprint: shift

my third godot wild jam participation. my personal goal for this one was to play with procedural map generation, and i'm quite pleased with how it turned out. :)

as always, feedback most welcome and appreciated!

(cemetery, i know...)
